ygData.subject: Re: Reinforcements
ygData.msgSnippet: Granite s body burns. Excellent, you are very worthy Sharpedge, but I m not sure if Granite was a important enough opponent for you. Deemos says. Our first

From: "THECODE" <thecode@...>

Granite's body burns.

"Excellent, you are very worthy Sharpedge, but I'm not sure if Granite was a
important enough opponent for you." Deemos says.

"Our first new mission will be to destroy the peace makers. Who shall be the
target? How about Vulois's group! That will be first!" Shokaract says.

"Well, seeing as how none of us seem to need repairs, it may be a good idea
to attack right now." Deemos says. The Mafia all bow to Shokaract upon
orders from Kracken. Shokaract likes it. Shokaract moves toward Vulois's
base. Deemos waves for everyone to follow. The Mafia follows Shokaract.
Testifier was shocked at the fact that the bot he seen looked just like
Technosis. He followed. Stronghold and Blender followed. Doom Ice, Serge,
and Rizopas came as well...
----- Original Message -----
From: <Alloran2@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, September 29, 2000 8:46 AM
Subject: Re: Reinforcements


> OOC: Soulstice, its up to you how much Granites body gets charred.  And
> Minime, peace doesnt suck, because if we ever have to end this RPG, Peace
> might be the way to finish it all!
>
> :::Hurricane/Sharpedge/The Skyscorchers:::
>
> ::He gets really excited to see all the chaos in the battle::
> Hurricane: Yeah, thats what im talking about!
> ::He transforms to beast mode and charges Griplash::
> --------------------------------------------------------------------------
----
>
> ---------------------------------------------
> ::Sharpedge removes his spinner-hand, revealing a torch hand(yeah i know
the
> toy doesnt have it, but still).  He waves it around and starts a fire,
> centered around Granites body::
> --------------------------------------------------------------------------
----
>
> ---------------------------------------------
> ::The Skyscorchers lay Eagle Eye's body down::
>
>
>
